name: Gardeners of the Bloodied Mines
description: Hailing from the the regions surrounding Kharth’s Daggers, the Gardeners of the Bloodied Mines are known for their skill at retrieving long lost relics… via methods savory and unsavory. Now lying in boredom, hungering for war, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
